summary: Identified 4 FIX/NOTE tags requiring implementation: (1) state modality definitions need consistent dependent type theory notation with explicit type signatures, (2-3) exclusivity and exhaustivity constraints must be generalized from counterfactual_worlds.tex to n-place functions, (4) verum/falsum NOTE comment should be removed as conventions are now documented. Also found 2 related FIX tags (lines 481, 534) for adding verum/falsum definitions and homomorphism identities.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing all FIX/NOTE tags with source material review, notation pattern analysis, and implementation recommendations
